Geometry package

0.3

LICENSE: LGPL

Package Overview

This package contains geometry related concepts, objects and methods which are used in other higher level packages. For example, it contains geometrical tools for the analysis of digital contours or digital objects.

Modules

  • Analysis of one-dimensional discrete structures
  • moduleEsimators
  • nD Volumetric Package
  • moduleShapesDigitizer
